analyzed: bcas khyod la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/bcom ldan gang gis  khyab 'jug la/_/

analyzed: gyis brgyan par mdzad/_/don kun byed pa'i dpag bsam shing /_/gangs

analyzed: mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad/_/de yi sbyin pa'i stobs mthong nas/_/sangs rgyas

analyzed: kyang ni ngo mtshhar 'gyur/_/thams cad mkhyen pa thob pa'i rgyu/_/sbyin pa gang

analyzed: 'phags pa 'dzam b+ha la la bstod pa zhes bya ba/
translated: Praise of Noble Jambhala🔽I constantly bow to the feet

analyzed: gdud par bgyi/_/gang la dad na 'jig rten 'di'i/_/dge ba'i rtsha bas

analyzed: 'gyur/_/btshun mo dam pas bskor ba yi/_/gzhal yas khang la rnam gnas

analyzed: mkhas pa/_/'dzam ba la'i sgrub byed ni/_/'jig rten pa dang mnyam med

analyzed: 'gyur/_/zhe sdang can du rigs mthun pa'i/_/bung ba lta bu'i gzugs

analyzed: bsngal spong /_/chos ston pa dang ltas ngan sel ba yi/_/dus gsum gzigs
